thread.title: Pair of PP QBs pace Calgary Hitmen to win over Red Deer Rebels [Photos]
thread.title_full: Pair of PP QBs pace Calgary Hitmen to win over Red Deer Rebels [Photos]

title: Pair of PP QBs pace Calgary Hitmen to win over Red Deer Rebels [Photos]
text:
By Scott Fisher , Calgary Sun First posted: Friday, October 09, 2015 10:48 PM MDT | Updated: Friday, October 09, 2015 11:04 PM MDT Hitmen Over Rebels 4-1 
Calgary Hitmen Ben Thomas smacks into Red Deer Rebels Presten Kopeck in WHL hockey action at the Scotiabank Saddledome in Calgary, Alta. on Friday October 9, 2015. Mike Drew/Calgary Sun/Postmedia Network Mike Drew/Calgary Sun 
Calgary Hitmen Beck Malenstyn tangles with Red Deer Rebels Kayle Doetzal in WHL hockey action at the Scotiabank Saddledome in Calgary, Alta. on Friday October 9, 2015. Mike Drew/Calgary Sun/Postmedia Network Mike Drew/Calgary Sun 
Calgary Hitmen goalie Lasse Petersen snags a Red Deer Rebels' shot in WHL hockey action at the Scotiabank Saddledome in Calgary, Alta. on Friday October 9, 2015. Mike Drew/Calgary Sun/Postmedia Network Mike Drew/Calgary Sun 
Calgary Hitmen Andrew Fyten goes down after being hit by a shot and gets an extra shot from Red Deer Rebels Austin Schmoorkoff shot in WHL hockey action at the Scotiabank Saddledome in Calgary, Alta. on Friday October 9, 2015. Mike Drew/Calgary Sun/Postmedia Network Mike Drew/Calgary Sun 
Calgary Hitmen Beck Malestyn and Layne Bensmiller cheer the Hitmen's first goal as Red Deer Rebels Kayle Doetzal skates by in WHL hockey action at the Scotiabank Saddledome in Calgary, Alta. on Friday October 9, 2015. Mike Drew/Calgary Sun/Postmedia Network Mike Drew/Calgary Sun 
Red Deer Rebels Ivan Nikolishin tucks the puck past Calgary Hitmen goalie Lasse Petersen for the first Red Deer goal with Hitmen Ben Thomas and Terrel Draude trail the play in WHL hockey action at the Scotiabank Saddledome in Calgary, Alta. on Friday October 9, 2015. Mike Drew/Calgary Sun/Postmedia Network Mike Drew/Calgary Sun 
Calgary Hitmen Beck Malenstyn cheers the Hitmen's second goal as Red Deer Rebels Lane Pederson sprawls on the ice in WHL hockey action at the Scotiabank Saddledome in Calgary, Alta. on Friday October 9, 2015. Mike Drew/Calgary Sun/Postmedia Network Mike Drew/Calgary Sun 
Calgary Hitmen Beck Malenstyn gets slammed by Red Deer Rebels Michael Spacek in WHL hockey action at the Scotiabank Saddledome in Calgary, Alta. on Friday October 9, 2015. Mike Drew/Calgary Sun/Postmedia Network Mike Drew/Calgary Sun 
Calgary Hitmen Beck Malenstyn battles with Red Deer Rebels Austin Strand in WHL hockey action at the Scotiabank Saddledome in Calgary, Alta. on Friday October 9, 2015. The Hitmen beat the Rebels 4-1. Mike Drew/Calgary Sun/Postmedia Network Mike Drew/Calgary Sun 
Calgary Hitmen goalie Lasse Patersen peers around a screen set up by Red Deer Rebels Presten Kopeck in WHL hockey action at the Scotiabank Saddledome in Calgary, Alta. on Friday October 9, 2015. The Hitmen beat the Rebels 4-1. Mike Drew/Calgary Sun/Postmedia Network Mike Drew/Calgary Sun 
Calgary Hitmen Jake Bean battles along the boards with Red Deer Rebels Adam Musil in WHL hockey action at the Scotiabank Saddledome in Calgary, Alta. on Friday October 9, 2015. The Hitmen beat the Rebels 4-1. Mike Drew/Calgary Sun/Postmedia Network Mike Drew/Calgary Sun 
Calgary Hitmen Jake Bean gets tangled up with Red Deer Rebels Grayson Pawlenchuk in WHL hockey action at the Scotiabank Saddledome in Calgary, Alta. on Friday October 9, 2015. The Hitmen beat the Rebels 4-1. Mike Drew/Calgary Sun/Postmedia Network Mike Drew/Calgary Sun
